Can I Play From Outside the US?
Absolutely! Our agents buy official Mega Millions tickets on your behalf at licensed retailers.
How Much Can I Win?
Mega Millions has no jackpot cap, so the sky's the limit! The largest Mega Millions jackpot ever was US$1.537 billion, won on October 23, 2018.
Have There Been Real Winners?
Our biggest Mega Millions winner is Nataliia from Ukraine! She scored a staggering US$1 million prize in 2017. Don't miss the chance to play Mega Millions and become our first jackpot winner!
